children.text: In the previous articles, the basic mechanism of decentralization and some of its financial applications are mentioned. In this article, another novel application of decentralization in finance and other industries will be introduced. This application is commonly known as the Metaverse.

Metaverse gained massive discussions after the CEO of Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, officially changed the company name to Meta. Since then, research and discussions related to Metaverse started to grow.
